titles.title: Truth in Lending Inflation Adjustment Act
To amend the Truth in Lending Act to adjust the exempt transactions amount for inflation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Mr. Bachus moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5507.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/1/2002--Introduced. Truth in Lending Inflation Adjustment Act - Amends the Consumer Credit Protection Act to increase from $25,000 to $75,000 the maximum amount of a non-mortgage credit or consumer lease transaction to which consumer credit cost information and disclosure requirements apply.
